featured.text: A new analysis of satellite-based data has given precisely the rate 21 which the country is losing size as it pushes northward against the Himalayas.

In everyday situations, too, stress can provide that extra push needed to do something difficult.
“Adam Joshua!” yelled Nelson, pushing away a basketball and shaking a toy frog off his foot.

However, each time he lost a dove into the cold water, and—with the help of her competition, his coaches would lock him in a cage sister and two men—swam and pushed the boat for for days, feeding him only coffee and bread.

definition.zh_def: 推動或施加力量使某物移動或改變位置。
definition.en_def: To exert force on something in order to move it away from oneself.
definition.example: She had to push the heavy door to get it open.
